name: LYKKE
description:
Go on an adventure with Lykke in the forest! 

Play as Lykke, as well as the trolls, to help Lykke traverse the environment! Picking up all the junk laying around.

A top-down puzzle adventure game* with cute hand-drawn graphics!

CONTROLS: Use WASD to move and SPACEBAR to interact. Press ESC to Exit Game.

*note: this is just a prototype and does not represent a finished game.
